name: test_metrics_configured
description:
arrange: Deploy postfix-relay.
    act: Get the metrics from the unit.
    assert: The metrics can be scraped and there are metrics.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: Deploy postfix-relay.
act: Get the metrics from the unit.
assert: The metrics can be scraped and there are metrics.

testStage.description:
arrange: Deploy postfix-relay.
    act: Get the metrics from the unit.
    assert: The metrics can be scraped and there are metrics.
